content: >this pattern can be downloaded also on payhip 1 with a pay what you want opiton this pattern was my holiday season 2020 gift for the knitters --- **pattern and design features ** - estimated yardage 70-90 grams of mc and 10-15 grams of cc - knitted cuff down - instructions written for magic loop but dpns can be used as well - instructions written in metric and us terminology - three sizes small 64 sts medium/large 72 sts and extra-large 80 sts - strong heel structure - charts but no written instructions for the stranded colourwork pattern and gusset increases 1 https //payhip com/b/ievm
